message:
Hi Iiro, this is Leo, I just received your email and I'm testing your service :)

The one thing that I really, really need, is to have an email sent out to the owner of the parent comment. So that if anyone asks anything on my site, and then I reply, this person will get a notification, containing again a link to the post.

Is that possible? I see that there are 2 inputs, "name" and "website (optional)", but not email. If you can support that, then I can consider your comment system...
